title: Sir Alex
overview: Sir Alex chronicles the incredible life and career of Sir Alex Ferguson, the most decorated football manager in British history.First-hand accounts from a host of former players and adversaries, including Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, Andy Cole, Gordon Strachan and Sir Kenny Dalglish, reveal what it was like to play for Sir Alex's all-conquering Manchester United and Aberdeen teams en route to their famous European triumphs in 1983 and 1999.
